Blount RL, Loiselle KA. Behavioural assessment of pediatric pain. Pain Res Manag. 2009 Jan-Feb;14(1):47-52. doi: 10.1155/2009/348184. PMID: 19262916; PMCID: PMC2706564.
McGrath PJ, Johnson G, Goodman JT, Dunn J, Chapman J. CHEOPS: A behavioral scale for rating postoperative pain in children. In: Fields HL, Dubner R, Cervero F, eds. Advances in Pain Research and Therapy. New York: Raven Press, 1985:395-402.

details.purpose: *To record each assessment parament and the total score for CHEOPS. (en)
details.use: *Use to record the results for each of the 6 parameters of the CHEOPS assessment. (en)

details.purpose: To record each assessment parament and the total score for CHEOPS.
details.use: Use to record the results for each of the 6 parameters of the CHEOPS assessment.

items.items: Children's Hospital of Eastern Ontario Pain Scale (CHEOPS)
Assessment tool used to asses post-operative pain in children between the age of 1 to 5 years.
Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.
The total sum of each component parameter for CHEOPS.
Score only if definite positive facial expression.
Score only if definite negative facial expression.
Complains about pain and other subjects
Additional information required to extend the model with local content or to align with other reference models or formalisms.
For example: local information requirements; or additional metadata to align with FHIR.
*Children's Hospital of Eastern Ontario Pain Scale (CHEOPS) (en)
*Assessment tool used to asses post-operative pain in children between the age of 1 to 5 years. (en)
*The total sum of each component parameter for CHEOPS. (en)
Endast om säkert fastställt positivt uttryck.
Endast om säkert fastställt negativt uttryck.
Barnet uttrycker sig positivt eller pratar om annat än bekymmer.
Smärta eller båda typer av klagande
Barnet klagar över smärta och annat
Kroppen (ej extremiteter) i vila; bålen är avslappnad.
Byter position, darrar, upprätt eller fastspänd
Sträcker sig, berör, greppar eller fastspänd
I vilken position som helst, men avslappnat.
*For example: local information requirements; or additional metadata to align with FHIR. (en)
